title: User journey reporting event metrics
description: For state transitions, we capture certain metrics along with the dimensions. This schema hold the metrics associated with reporting of state transition

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Entered Journey
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when a journey instance is created

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Exited journey
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when a journey instance is flagged as ended

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Error in Journey Instance
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an error is raised in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Eroor in step processing
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an error occurs during an event processing, that is during a step processing

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Error in action execution
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an error occurs during an action execution

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Error in jump action
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an error occurs during the jump action execution

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Error in enrichment
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an error occurs during enrichment

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Event processed
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an event as triggered a transition in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Action executed
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an action is executed successfully in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Flow control executed
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an action is executed successfully in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Executed jump action
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when a jump action is executed successfully in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Enrichment made successfully
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when an enrichment is executed successfully in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Jump action executed successfully
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when a jump to another journey instance is made

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Timeout In Action
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when timeout occurs during execution of an action

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Timeout in Event
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when timeout occurs during the processing of an event

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Timeout In Journey
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when timeout occurs during the flow of a journey

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Timeout In Enrichment
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: Set to 1 when timeout occurs during enrichement
